summary: Phase 6 Cache-First Performance Overhaul Testing PASSED. All 3 new pages (streaks.tsx, smart-alerts.tsx, help.tsx) load instantly without blocking spinners. Fixed 2 bugs in help.tsx: 1) Missing 'Linking' import from react-native, 2) Undefined 'loadingTickets' variable changed to 'isFetchingInBackground && tickets.length === 0'. Regression check confirmed 5 profile pages from iteration_176 still working correctly.

code_bugs_fixed.issue: Missing 'Linking' import from react-native - used but not imported
code_bugs_fixed.fix: Added 'Linking' to the import statement from 'react-native'

code_bugs_fixed.issue: Used undefined 'loadingTickets' variable - would cause runtime error
code_bugs_fixed.fix: Changed 'loadingTickets' to 'isFetchingInBackground && tickets.length === 0' to match cache-first pattern

critical_code_review_comments: Cache-first pattern correctly implemented in all 3 new pages (streaks, smart-alerts, help)
streaks.tsx: Uses getCachedSync(CACHE_KEYS.STREAKS) for instant init, isFetchingInBackground state, shows empty state for leaderboard
smart-alerts.tsx: Uses getCachedSync(CACHE_KEYS.SMART_ALERTS) for instant init, shows login prompt for unauth users instantly
help.tsx: Uses getCachedSync(CACHE_KEYS.SUPPORT_TICKETS) for instant init, FAQ content renders immediately (static data)
SUPPORT_TICKETS cache key correctly added to cacheManager.ts
localStorage quota exceeded warning remains (minor issue - not blocking functionality)

test_credentials.note: Testing done without authentication - cache-first pattern verified for unauthenticated state showing appropriate prompts/empty states instantly

context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 6 cache-first testing complete. 3 new pages (streaks, smart-alerts, help) + 5 profile pages from iteration_176 all verified to load instantly without blocking spinners. 2 bugs fixed in help.tsx (missing Linking import, undefined loadingTickets variable). localStorage quota exceeded warning is a minor issue that doesn't block functionality.

bugs_fixed: Fixed undefined loadingTickets to isFetchingInBackground && tickets.length === 0
